## Grade: 85/100

**Comment:** This is a well-written and thoughtful response that demonstrates a deep understanding of the significance of the title "King of the Jews" in relation to Jesus' identity as the Messiah. The student clearly articulates the political and spiritual dimensions of the title, highlighting how Jesus fulfilled the spiritual expectations while navigating the political realities of his time. The inclusion of references to prophecies and historical context adds depth and credibility to the response.
